editorialNotes.standard: Easy to understand, quick to set up, and slick to use, you can create individual groups for your friends. Originally making its name among videogame players, these days, it’s used by everyone.
editorialNotes.short: A social network for gamers to chat in real time.

editorialNotes.tagline: A fun way to learn a language
editorialNotes.standard: With its friendly approach and awesome updates, Duolingo’s long been one of our favourite apps for learning another language. Its secret: making the process genuinely fun. Engaging mini-games test your reading, writing and speaking skills, and joining a club (where you can encourage and compete with others) adds a great social element. Bonus: all those languages and games are available for free!
editorialNotes.short: Learn a new language. Join a club, chat with bots and get reminders to practice.

editorialNotes.standard: This digital notepad and PDF markup tool covers all the bases. Create notes with your keyboard or Apple Pencil: the app transforms your hand-drawn shapes into perfect ones, and can even convert your handwriting to text.
editorialNotes.short: Go paperless with ease and enjoy the handwriting recognition feature.
1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3... Bring numbers to life with colors. 🖍🎨

editorialNotes.tagline: Learn and play in Toca’s world
editorialNotes.standard: This brings together all the Toca Life apps, letting your beloved characters from different apps mingle in one beautiful world–a world that keeps growing with new areas to explore and characters to meet.
editorialNotes.short: Enrich your child’s imagination through creative world-building.

editorialNotes.standard: You need toothpaste, golf clubs, and batteries—and you need them now. Known for its colossal shopping catalog, Amazon packs virtually all of the features and functions found on its website into this ample app, whether you’re buying gifts, tracking orders, or scanning items in a brick-and-mortar store for an online price comparison. It’s easy to navigate, intuitive, and extremely fast.
editorialNotes.short: Size up your next couch with AR product stickers

editorialNotes.standard: We rely on this sleek, powerful notetaker to annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations, and more. With built-in iCloud support, it’s perfect for keeping notes, documents and doodles up to date across devices.
editorialNotes.short: Annotate documents, record lectures, sketch illustrations and more.
Show off your creativity with a wide array of tools and brushes.

editorialNotes.standard: Few things are more relaxing than settling down with a good colouring book—at least, until the kid we borrowed it from asks for it back. Pigment unleashes our grown-up creative energy with a surprisingly deep array of artist’s tools and tweaks. It even lets us automatically colour within the lines, giving our productions a sheen of perfection. We expect a call from the gallery any day now.
editorialNotes.short: Get cracking with colours.

editorialNotes.standard: It’s become our go-to way (and word) for connecting with people in other places. Featuring elegant design, reliable performance, and constantly evolving features.
